title: Pesto Pizza Grilled Cheese Sandwiches
directions: For each sandwich, spread pesto on both slices of bread, and place a slice of cheese on each slice. Evenly arrange pepperoni over the cheese on one slice of bread and tomato slices over the other.
Place ½ slice of cheese over the pepperoni, and place open sandwiches directly on the oven rack in the preheated oven. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bread is toasted.
Carefully remove sandwiches from the oven, put the sides together, slice in half, and serve.
